title: RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > Product Description > RAK12052 Overview: 32x24 Thermal IR Array Module
content: **RAK12052** is a 32x24 thermal IR array module based on MLX90640 from Melexis. MLX90640 is a fully-calibrated 32x24 pixels thermal IR array in an industry-standard 4-lead TO39 package with a digital interface, and it contains 768FIR pixels. An ambient sensor is integrated to measure the ambient temperature of the chip and a supply sensor to measure the VDD. The outputs of all sensors IR, Ta, and VDD are stored in internal RAM and accessible through I2C. It is comparable in having a thermal
parent_content: **RAK12052** is a 32x24 thermal IR array module based on MLX90640 from Melexis. MLX90640 is a fully-calibrated 32x24 pixels thermal IR array in an industry-standard 4-lead TO39 package with a digital interface, and it contains 768FIR pixels. An ambient sensor is integrated to measure the ambient temperature of the chip and a supply sensor to measure the VDD. The outputs of all sensors IR, Ta, and VDD are stored in internal RAM and accessible through I2C. It is comparable in having a thermal camera (or Predator's vision) but in compact but useable low resolution.

title: RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > Product Description > RAK12052 Overview: 32x24 Thermal IR Array Module
content: and VDD are stored in internal RAM and accessible through I2C. It is comparable in having a thermal camera (or Predator's vision) but in compact but useable low resolution.
parent_content: **RAK12052** is a 32x24 thermal IR array module based on MLX90640 from Melexis. MLX90640 is a fully-calibrated 32x24 pixels thermal IR array in an industry-standard 4-lead TO39 package with a digital interface, and it contains 768FIR pixels. An ambient sensor is integrated to measure the ambient temperature of the chip and a supply sensor to measure the VDD. The outputs of all sensors IR, Ta, and VDD are stored in internal RAM and accessible through I2C. It is comparable in having a thermal camera (or Predator's vision) but in compact but useable low resolution.

title: RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > RAK12052 WisBlock Thermal IR Array Module > Prerequisites > RAK12052 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12052**, you need a **WisBlock Base** board to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** board provides power supply to the **RAK12052** module. Furthermore, you need the **WisBlock Core** module to use the RAK12052.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with screws to ensure proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12052**, you need a **WisBlock Base** board to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** board provides power supply to the **RAK12052** module. Furthermore, you need the **WisBlock Core** module to use the RAK12052.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with screws to ensure proper function.
